title: I cant log onto league today
body: I was playing yesterday no problems. i got to log on 30 mins ago and my league cleint wont load at all. if i click on the league icon to try to open it, it just has the normal small league of legends but wont go past that to be able to hit play. Ive restarted my pc and ive gone through to get into the launcher part and that doesnt work either. i feel like i have to reinstall but i really dont want to anyone haveing the same problems pls help this is RAGEING me !!!

replies.body: It sounds like your OS is blocking the patcher from launching due to a permissions issue.  DTN provided a solid workaround for this but we also have a [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide that can help get this fixed up for you.
Could you try running the launcher as an administrator, and/or using the **lol.launcher.admin** (found in the top of your League folder) to start it?
yo riot help. you made me move my post to an area where no one looks or helps. atleast you can try to do something
